title: Process-oriented diagnostics: principles, practice, community development, and common standards
journal: Bulletin of the American Meteorological Society
contributionStatement: Served as Co-PI and guided the research team at GFDL. Co-developed joint diagnostic standards to be used by NOAA, the National Center for Atmospheric Research, and the Department of Energy's modeling efforts. Led the summary and recommendations section of the manuscript. (C=35\% / I=30\% / W=30\%)
